column2: Use your Mech suit to attack this settlement
Use your Mech suit to attack this settlement
Use your Mech suit to attack this settlement

Faced with the enemy's defenses, you decide to soften them up yourself with your Mech Suit. You mount your Mech Suit, praying to your God before you launch an assault on the objective. "ALL SYSTEMS FUNCTIONAL. READY FOR COMBAT DEPLOYMENT", your Suit says to you.
Use your Mech Suit to assault this castle's walls
My troops can handle this by themselves, actually

Unfortunately, your assault ended in abject failure. Your enemy was well prepared to counter your Mech Suit, destroying it and badly injuring you. Your allies were able to drag you off of the battlefield, but your Mech Suit lies in ruin...
